interndetails.name: Jayandra Thapa
interndetails.description: Hello, It’s me Jayandra Thapa. I'm a passionate frontend developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I have completed several personal projects where I enhanced my skills in creating responsive and user-friendly websites. I'm excited about this internship opportunity because it will allow me to apply my knowledge in a professional setting and further develop my skills under the guidance of experienced mentors.
